name: nativescript-context-apis
description: Painless access to contextual information for your NativeScript apps

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run ios --watch
scripts.demo.android: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run android --watch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && cd ../demo && tns test ios --watch
scripts.test.android: npm i && cd ../demo && tns test android --watch
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-context-apis && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
